metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26563 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Tildeslash Monit before 5.31.0, allows remoteattackers to gain escilated privlidges due to improper PAM-authorization.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26563` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

monit - 1:5.31.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: monit package in esm-apps/jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.31.0-1').
